Name: Veteran Agent Power Suit
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Veteran Agents will ride a Power Suit that can use the Double Jump skill to move very quickly.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
Veteran Agents will ride a Power Suit that can use the Double Jump skill to move very quickly. Double-click your destination on the World Map and you will fly automatically toward it along the navigation route. (Auto flight is available only on certain continents, including Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Riding Authorization Continents by purchasing Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Veteran Agents will ride a Power Suit that can use the Double Jump skill to move very quickly.

H.Old: DEF: +10, Movement Speed: 180, Auto Pilot Speed: Very Fast, Jump: 120
H.New: Increases DEF by 10, Speed by 180, Jump by 120

h1.Old: DEF: +10, Movement Speed: 180, Auto Pilot Speed: Very Fast, Jump: 120
h1.New: Increases DEF by 10, Speed by 180, Jump by 120

HFields.h1: Increases DEF by 10, Speed by 180, Jump by 120
